outputs.output_descr: The post elections violence livelihoods recovery project is placed against the post-elections context in 2007/2008. The project aims to contributes to the post election violence recovery and reintegration process through the restoration of livelihoods in targetted communities affected by the violence. The project has 2 outputs: 1)Enhanced livelihooods restoration initatives for socio-economic recovery for affected communities 2) Expanded livelihoods opportunities and linkage for ongoing national livelihood programmes

project_descr: Post Election Violence Livelihood Recovery Project
project_title: Post Election Violence Livelihoods Recovery Project
